bot_welcome_to_new_person: Welcome new person!  I'm a bot.
root_dialog_on_default: What??? I don't know what to do! - Root Dialog
need_to_log_in: I'm sorry. In order to use this functionality you must log in.
start_of_example_string_responses: ******************************* EVERYTHING BELOW HERE IS FOR A TEMPLATE EXAMPLE DIALOG *******************************
proactive_msg_one_to_one: This message was proactively sent to the 1:1 chat.
help_msg:
hello
multi dialog 2
roster
names
last dialog
send message to 1:1
setup text message
update text message
setup card message
prompt_for_work_item_id: What is the id of the work item you are looking for?
deeplink_card_text:
NOTE: Deeplinks to configurable tabs only work if the tab has been added
If you do not see the button for the deeplink to the configurable tab, make this call in a channel that has the configurable tab.
please_return_to_teams: Please return to Teams and paste this number into the chat: %s
game_name_prompt: Hi!  I'm a bot.  What is your name?
game_button_prompt: Let's play a game!  You pick a button, and I will repeat it.
game_failure_funny: Awwww man!  I'm still in the prototype phase.
prompt_for_validation_number: Please copy and paste the number returned after logging in.
error_validating_user: Error validating your identity.  Please log in again.
at_mention: - I'm a bot, and I at-mentioned you.
set_alarm_msg: Received a set alarm intent ('builtin.intent.alarm.set_alarm') from Luis.
delete_alarm_msg: Received a delete alarm intent ('builtin.intent.alarm.delete_alarm') from Luis.
cmd_only_works_in_channel: Sorry - this call only works when called from within a channel chat
choose_channel_prompt: What channel would you like to send a message to?
channel_choice_failure: Could not find the channel you were looking for
proactive_channel_msg: This is a proactive channel message.
proactive_msg_in_reply_chain: This message has been put in the first proactive message's reply chain.
end_of_example_string_responses: ******************************* EVERYTHING ABOVE HERE IS FOR A TEMPLATE EXAMPLE DIALOG *******************************
prompt_for_timestamp: Please enter a timestamp; questions dated on or after that timestamp will be retrieved.
